channel.title: Npc making
channel.description:
im trying to make my own npc, heres what ive done so far with my little knowledge of codeing: on testscape server:
npcdrops.cfg [code]npcdrop = 3633 1 995 1000000 1305 1 1050 1 1057 1 1038 1 7927 1 7928 1 962 2 3123 500[/code]
npc.cfg [code]npc = 3633 Monster_of_Death 300 300[/code]
autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 3633 3236 3430 0 3233 3431 3240 3428 2 You Are SCREWED[/code]
what did i do wrong, did i miss something, i think i did it right but it gets an error when i use it.

item.title: Npc making
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Are you trying to make this npc talk to or trade? If so you have to add soemthing to npc handler or client.If your trying to make it trade let me know and ill tell you how to do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc making
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

im trying to make my own npc, heres what ive done so far with my little knowledge of codeing: on testscape server:

npcdrops.cfg

npcdrop = 3633		1		995	1000000	1305	1	1050	1	1057	1	1038	1	7927	1	7928	1	962	2	3123	500

npc.cfg

npc = 3633	Monster_of_Death		300	300

autospawn.cfg

spawn = 3633	3236	3430	0	3233	3431	3240	3428	2	You Are SCREWED

what did i do wrong, did i miss something, i think i did it right but it gets an error when i use it.

Read full topic
